reviewText:
This was absolutely one of the worse DVDs I ever bought from Amazon and I've bought a lot over the years. Basically it's 3 Brits, 2 women and 1 man discussing whether they exist or not etc. They were hard to understand due to the accent.
There was no videography...just people sitting at a desk talking. That's it! Great looking cover though.
All products on Amazon should be required to give a thorough description of the product before it can even be sold.
